'''''Vinyar Tengwar 26''''' is the twenty-sixth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|25|27}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Kirith Aglon" — Tom Loback
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "''Ai Tuor''" — trans. Christopher Gilson
* "Uglúk to the Dung-pit"✫ — Carl F. Hostetter
* "''Lant Gil-galad''" — trans. Eli Bar-Yahalom
* "''Elityellë''" (column) — Eli Bar-Yahalom
* "''Essitalmar'': Thufferin' Thucotash!" (column) — Tom Loback
* "Transitions in Translations: 'Edition Shifting' in the Revised Dutch Hobbit" (column) — Arden R. Smith

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
